DOC.brief_summary: Practical experience report (PER) investigating the effect of Micardis® on the average 24h blood pressure of therapy-naive and therapy-experienced patients
DOC.brief_title: Investigating the Effect of Telmisartan (Micardis®) on the Average 24h Blood Pressure of Therapy-naive and Therapy-experienced Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Patients who have recently been diagnosed with hypertension 2. Patients whose current blood pressure treatment are inadequate and needs to be revised are suitable for inclusion. Exclusion criteria: None (according to investigator)
